explanation: [0-0] A person's left hand holds a square white marshmallow, and the right hand holds a black pen. The background is a pile of square marshmallows with various expressions drawn on them.

[0-3] Next, the right hand uses the pen to draw black eyes and a mouth on the marshmallow. Then, using a pair of scissors, a cut is made at the mouth. Both hands pull apart the cut. Afterward, the marshmallow is placed on a white baking sheet inside a black microwave oven. The marshmallow gradually expands, and the cut gradually widens.

[0-3] Next, the right hand uses the pen to draw black eyes and a mouth on the marshmallow. Then, using a pair of scissors, a cut is made at the mouth. Both hands pull apart the cut. Afterward, the marshmallow is placed on a white baking sheet inside a black microwave oven. The marshmallow gradually expands, and the cut gradually widens.

[0-3] Next, the right hand uses the pen to draw black eyes and a mouth on the marshmallow. Then, using a pair of scissors, a cut is made at the mouth. Both hands pull apart the cut. Afterward, the marshmallow is placed on a white baking sheet inside a black microwave oven. The marshmallow gradually expands, and the cut gradually widens.

[3-13] Then the scene switches to two men standing in front of a white wall. The man on the left has black, medium-length curly hair and a thick, black beard. He is wearing a necklace with a black cord and a silver pendant, and a dark blue shirt. The man on the right has short, black curly hair and a thick, black beard, and is wearing a white T-shirt. He points his right index finger at the camera. The two are going to make marshmallows in the same way. Next, the left hand holds a white marshmallow, and the right hand draws black eyes and a mouth on the marshmallow with a black pen. Then, a cut is made at the mouth with scissors. It is placed on a white plate and put into the microwave. As it heats, the white marshmallow does not expand from the cut but expands as a whole. Finally, the two men talk while making a gesture with their right hand: the thumb pressing the tips of the index and middle fingers together.
